Eval with Xcas, MicroPython or Javascript

This HTML file is a simple example of use of Giac/Xcas inside HTML/Javascript. Enter an expression to evaluate and choose the interpreter.
The required files are giacsimple.js and giacwasm.js, giacwasm.wasm for Web-Assembly compatible browsers or giac.js otherwise.
